show_name: Crayon Shin-chan: Arashi o Yobu Jungle (movie 8)
other_title: Shin chan - perdidos en la jungla (Spanish)
Shin chan eta bere lagunak oihanean galduta
Shin chan: perduts a la jungla
クレヨンしんちゃん 嵐を呼ぶジャングル (Japanese)
蠟筆小新-風起雲湧的叢林冒險 (Chinese (Taiwan))
plot: The Nohara family is on a cruise heading towards a tropical island when suddenly the ship is invaded by a large group of monkeys. The simians capture all adults and take them to a nearby isle while leaving all children behind. It is up to Shin-chan and his friends to find and save the grown-ups.
